name: TheCall
description:
A prototype for a survival game. The development objective is to make a game with minimal controls requirement.

Goals: Survive as long as you can. 

Mechanics: Every minute, the type of enemy will change and trade screen will appear. Player need to pick a trade to continue the game.

Controls:

  • A - Move Left 
  • D - Move Right 
  • W - High Attack 
  • S - Low Attack
